General.Name: Guararapes Confecções S.A
General.Description: Guararapes Confecções S.A. engages in the manufacture, distribution, and retail of fashion clothes in Brazil. It also offers financial services, including interest-bearing installment sales, personal loans, and cash withdrawals; and financial products. In addition, it owns Shopping Midway Mall located in Natal. As of December 31, 2021, it operated a network of 364 stores. The company was founded in 1947 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Lemos Monteiro, São Paulo, SP, Brazil
